reference.title: New Broadcast Receiver wizard
reference.shortdesc: Creates a new Android broadcast receiver.

strow.stentry: The folder into which the source code for the new broadcast receiver is to be stored. By default this is the current project's src folder.
The package that is to contain the new broadcast receiver. By default this is the current project's package.
The name to be used for the class that implements the broadcast receiver. This should be a simple, non-qualified name.

(optional) The label for the broadcast receiver. Note that if you specify a label, the New Broadcast Receiver wizard creates a string resource to hold this value. If the Default option is selected, a label is not set for this broadcast receiver (the Label field is not editable); the application's label is used instead.
The class from which the broadcast receiver inherits. For broadcast receivers, this is android.app.BroadcastReceiver.
(optional) Permissions that should be added to the project's manifest file due to this broadcast receiver. Click Add to display a list of possible permissions from which you can select.
(optional) The actions to be performed by an intent filter associated with this broadcast receiver. Click Add to select from the available actions.
(optional) The associated intent filter's categories. Click Add to select from the available categories.
